entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is going to send a letter to Sirius using Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who accompanies him to the Owlery. He is shocked to hear that Karkaroff was a Death Eater but later thinks it fits with what he already knew.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who accompanies him to the Owlery. She is not mentioned as having any specific thoughts or actions in this passage.

entities.name: Pigwidgeon
entities.description: A small owl that Harry uses to send a letter to Sirius.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who is the recipient of the letter. He has told Harry about Karkaroff being a Death Eater.

entities.name: Karkaroff
entities.description: A former Death Eater who was friends with Malfoy's father and is now in trouble for putting Harry's name in the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: Malfoy
entities.description: The son of a former Death Eater who was friends with Karkaroff. He mentioned on the train that his father knew Karkaroff.

relationships.description: Harry is using Pigwidgeon to send a letter to Sirius. This is mentioned in the sentence 'so that Harry could send S i r i u s  a  l e t t e r'.
Ron is suspecting Karkaroff of being a Death Eater. This is mentioned in the sentence 'by the time they entered the Owlery Ron was saying th at they ought to have suspected it all along'.
Karkaroff has put Harry's name in the Goblet of Fire. This is mentioned in the sentence 'if it was Karkaroff who put yo ur name in the gob-let'.
Malfoy's father and Karkaroff were friends. This is mentioned in the sentence 'Rem ember what Malfoy said on the train, about his dad being friends with Karkaroff?'
